dmca.title: divine e-commerce patents (1)
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

Pleased be advised that our client, divine technology ventures, has referred the matter of [your] infringement of divine's patents to our attention. We have conducted an independent infringement analysis and have determined that at least U.S. Patent Nos. 5,715,314 and 5,909,492 are infringed by [your] website.

If you wish to resolve this matter amicably, please contact me immediately. In this regard, divine is willing to license the patents in issue on a reasonable basis. On the other hand, if [your company] is not interested in a license and instead will terminate its infringing activities, please contact me so we can discuss how to redress the infringement that has occurred to date.

If we do not receive a response within seven days from the date of this letter, we will assume that [your company] is not interested in resolving this matter on an amicable basis and will proceed accordingly. Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or require any further information regarding this matter.

Very truly yours,

[Private]
